document.full_text: the supreme court said on monday it would hear an appeal by parents who want secretary of state hillary clinton to record israel, not just jerusalem, on their son's u.s. passport.
document.title: supreme court to consider jerusalem passport case
lines_and_colors: the supreme court said on monday it would hear an appeal by parents who want secretary of state hillary clinton to record israel, not just jerusalem, on their son's u.s. passport.
